HOME REMEDIES: 1.If you are on medications to manage your hepatitis B, do not take herbs or supplements unless your doctor recommends it.
2.Look for a wide array of proteins, including lean meats, poultry, fish, beans, eggs, nuts, seeds, milk, yogurt and cheese.

3.Plenty of fruits and vegetables.
Whole grains such as oats, brown rice, barley, and quinoa.
Lean protein such as fish, skinless chicken, egg whites, and beans.
Low-fat or non-fat dairy products.
Healthy fats like those in nuts, avocados, and olive oil.
